summary: SummaryCharlotte Tilbury's Beauty Highlighter Wand is a multi-use illuminating gel that can be worn as a highlighter or blush for buildable color and an instant glow. Dot and blend for easy application.
details: DetailsFeaturesThis liquid highlighter/blush enhances skin's luminosity for a glossy highlight that plays with the light.The smooth, long-lasting formula has a non-greasy finish and is available in flexible shades.Apply to the apples of your cheeks or wherever you want a soft-focused glow.Key IngredientsSoft Focus Silica: Rich velvety texture blurs imperfections.Lustrous Polymers: Enhances skin luminosity with a smooth texture.Sensorial Oil: Imparts a silky soft feel and shine.Item 2619318How To UseTwist to open applicator.Squeeze desired amount of product onto applicator sponge and lock the applicator.Option 1: Apply 1-2 dots to the apples of the cheek and blend with your fingers.Option 2: Apply using a brush directly from the applicator and buff into the cheeks.Option 3: To dial it up, apply a powder blush on top for a multi-dimensional flush to the cheeks.IngredientsWater, Hydrogenated Didecene, Isododecane, Mica, Glycerin, Propanediol, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Silica, Sodium Chloride, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Hydroxyacetophenone, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Lindera Strychnifolia Root Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Carmine (CI 45470).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Twist to open applicator.Squeeze desired amount of product onto applicator sponge and lock the applicator.Option 1: Apply 1-2 dots to the apples of the cheek and blend with your fingers.Option 2: Apply using a brush directly from the applicator and buff into the cheeks.Option 3: To dial it up, apply a powder blush on top for a multi-dimensional flush to the cheeks.

reviews.headline: Lightest shade too dark
reviews.comments: Im not even crazy fair but the lightest shade is still too dark to be a highlighter for me.

reviews.headline: So goodâ€¦.
reviews.comments: I love this CT product. I bought the Pinkgasm and Peachgasm. As s natural redhead, I've always been taught to lean towards peachy cheek shades.  The Peachgasm is very subtle and I personally add another peach cream blush with it to amp up the intensity. Pinkgasm is amazing on its own and looks great. I love the shimmer they give and that they arent drying to my skin; also does not settle into any pesky fine lines that creep up. Beautiful product and although it's a bit pricey, its so worth it!!

reviews.headline: CT highlighter
reviews.comments: One of the best highlighter I have ever used. It looks so natural without being glittery or sparkly.

reviews.headline: Not great but not bad
reviews.comments: I havw the highlighter, blush, and bronzer. None of them are worth the price. They can easily become patchy and my highlighter tube completely busted at the top:(

reviews.headline: Not happy with the results.
reviews.comments: Not sure this product is for every skin tone...

reviews.headline: Best of the best
reviews.comments: I tried many highlighters before this, mainly powders, but this has been by and large the best highlighter I have used to achieve proper glam. I was worried the shimmer level would be too over the top, but its perfect for enhancing a glowy summer look.

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: This works as a blush too. I use this with the CT cream bronzer and I am always complimented on the glow! I use the color pinkgasm and absolutely LOVE it!

reviews.headline: I like the product just not the sunset shade
reviews.comments: Love the pinkgasm shade, I've used it for years. I tried out the sunset shade, and I absolutely hate it. It comes across orange/red

reviews.headline: Great product, not enough for the price
reviews.comments: I love this blush. It blends so smooth and looks great! But, theres just not enough product to justify the price. I orobably wont buy again.

reviews.headline: Best highlighter I've ever used
reviews.comments: I have used so many beands of highlighter, so many. This is my fav by far. Gives skin that natural dewy glow. You only need a tiny bit. i dot on my cheeks, end of my nose and chin and blend with an small angeld face brush. I have the original pillow talk shade

reviews.headline: Don't recommend
reviews.comments: Literally left no shine, took forever to get it out because it was full of air, way to dark and i got the lighest shade.

reviews.headline: Applicator a Problem
reviews.comments: Do not like this applicator!  Its hard to regulate how much comes out and I feel absolutely useless to blend.  I ended up just using my fingers to blend.  Once blended, its pretty nice.

reviews.headline: not a winner
reviews.comments: didn't blend well, better products at a fraction of the price. used my points to splurge on this & was disappointed!

reviews.headline: OK
reviews.comments: Pigment is OK, the sponge is gross in my opinion and you get so little product for the price. Better products out there with better quality, price and no gross sponge.

reviews.headline: Natural Go-Tp
reviews.comments: I purchased, Pillow Talk Original. I have received several compliments after wearing this as a natural blush/glow. It has helped my winter skin brighten while it is waiting to get the natural exposure from being outdoors. I still have a glow after 12 hours of wear. The packaging is much better than the  Tarte version I have used. The applicator allows better control during application

reviews.headline: GORGEOUS
reviews.comments: This highlighter is gorgeous, and a little goes a long way so it's lasts, it's easy to blend and durable to withstand heat and the humidity. I'm in love

faceoff_positive.comments:
I recently had the pleasure of trying out the Charlotte Tilbury Pinkgasm Beauty Light Wand and I must say, it exceeded all my expectations. The product was sent to me as a gift for my honest review. This product is truly a game-changer in the world of highlighters.

First and foremost, let's talk about the shade Pinkgasm. It is a stunning, universally flattering pink hue with the perfect amount of shimmer. It adds a beautiful, ethereal glow to my skin that makes me feel like a glowing goddess. Whether I'm going for a natural, everyday look or a more glamorous evening look, this shade complements any makeup look effortlessly.

The packaging of the Pinkgasm Beauty Light Wand is also worth mentioning. It comes in a sleek, rose gold tube that looks so luxurious and sophisticated. The twist-up mechanism is convenient and ensures that I dispense just the right amount of product every time. The brush applicator is soft and allows for precise application, making it easy to achieve that perfect, lit-from-within look.

One of the standout features of this product is its incredible formula. It is lightweight, blendable, and buildable, allowing me to customize the intensity of the highlight. It effortlessly glides onto my skin, leaving behind a seamless, radiant finish. I love how it doesn't emphasize any texture or pores, making my skin look flawless.

Another aspect that I appreciate about this beauty light wand is its long-lasting power. Once applied, it stays put throughout the day, without fading or smudging. I don't have to worry about constant touch-ups, which is a huge plus for me, especially during busy days.

Furthermore, the Pinkgasm Beauty Light Wand is infused with hyaluronic acid and rosehip oil, which adds a nourishing and hydrating element to the product. It feels like I'm not only enhancing my makeup but also taking care of my skin at the same time. This is a major win for someone like me who values skincare as much as makeup.

In conclusion, the Charlotte Tilbury Pinkgasm Beauty Light Wand is a must-have in anyone's makeup collection. Its stunning shade, impeccable formula, and long-lasting power make it a standout highlighter. If you're looking to achieve that coveted, radiant glow, I highly recommend giving this product a try. It's worth every penny and is sure to become a staple in your makeup routine.
faceoff_positive.headline: Game changer

faceoff_negative.comments: I was gifted the Charlotte Tilbury Pinkgasm Sunset Beauty Light Wand complementary from Influenster and it is definitely a beautiful product. I'm more of a minimalist "no makeup" makeup gal, so this is not something I see myself using casually, as it is quite shimmery and intense, but it will definitely pack a punch on a night out. It has a very orange/red undertone (I'm sure my fair complexion plays a big part in this) and is loaded with little glitter particles, but the payoff isn't as intimidating as you'd think - it's actually pretty sheer and buildable. I found the product was heavily absorbed by a Beauty Blender, and was too streaky to be blended with my finger. A soft foundation brush seemed to do the trick!
faceoff_negative.headline: Shimmer to the Max!
